title.abbrev: IPATM WG ATM Forum Recommendations V1

front.title: IP over ATM Working Group's Recommendations for the ATM Forum's Multiprotocol BOF Version 1

abstract.t: This document represents an initial list of requirements submitted to the ATM Forum's Multiprotocol BOF for the operation of IP over ATM networks as determined by the IETF IP over ATM Working Group and other working groups. This RFC is issued for the benefit of community members. The information contained in this document is accurate as of the date of publication, but is subject to change. Subsequent RFCs will reflect such changes.
The content of this memo was submitted by the IETF Liaison to the ATM Forum as contribution number 94-0954 in the ATM Forum's documentation process on 14 September 1994.
